name: Flippin Kaktus Demo
description:
FLIPPIN KAKTUS is a platformer done rrright. It’s story of mistery, despair, fury, forgiveness, love, crime, conspiracy will twist and surprise!

Enjoy prickly characters, dark humour and dopy NPCs. Embrace the music of American South and swing along the 80s rock ballads.

Do you have juice to become the Kaktus?

Current version is the demo of the full game, which is in active development.

More details on the official site flippinkaktus.com.
